summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; approving preliminary plans for a residential planned unit development on two parcels of property in the RM 800 Zone in Blocks 7 and 10, Renton's Addition to Seattle (Petition of Bruce Lorig, C.F. 286346, and amending Plat 41W, Page 112, of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle (Ordinance 86300).
